column6: Spider-Man gets the trill of a lifetime as he meets the living legend of World War II, Captain America!  Webs spin and shields fly as Cap and everybody's favorite wall-crawler come face to face with the Gray Gargoyle and the nefarious schemes of AIM!
column8: | inker:Pat Davidson | writer:Todd Dezago | penciller (cover):Randall Green | penciller:Lou Kang | letterer:Dave Sharpe | colorist:Avalon Studio
